title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Theory-Based Learning Scenario Design Using Ontology Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general computer literacy
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners understand the OMNIBUS ontology structure and can explain relationships between various learning theories.
Learners can design standards-based science education scenarios using the SMARTIES system.
Learners apply an integrated approach to bridge the gap between theory and practical educational technology in project deliverables.
Learners collaboratively develop mobile-optimized PBL-based science education scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
